resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/105155</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>105155</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206597</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Slavery and Abolition</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sklaverei und Aufhebung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Esclavage et abolition</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Slavery e abolition</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Slavery ed abolizione</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σκλαβιά και κατάργηση</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esclavitud y abolición</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">presents two dozen publications written in the 19th century about slavery in America. It includes first-person accounts from former slaves, judicial opinions, abolitionist pieces, and more.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Geschenke zwei Publikationen Dutzend geschrieben 
in das 19. Jahrhundert über Sklaverei in Amerika. Es schließt 
Erstperson Konten von den ehemaligen Sklaven, von den 
Gerichtsmeinungen, von den abolitionist Stücken und von mehr ein.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">présents deux publications douzaine écrites au 
19ème siècle au sujet de l'esclavage en Amérique. Elle inclut
des comptes de premier-personne d'anciens esclaves, d'avis juridiques,
de morceaux d'abolitionniste, et de plus.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">presentes duas publicações dúzia escritas no 
1ø século sobre o slavery em América. Inclui clientes da 
primeiro-pessoa dos escravos anteriores, das opiniões judiciais, das 
partes do abolitionist, e de mais.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">presenti due pubblicazioni dozzina scritte nel 
diciannovesimo secolo circa slavery in America. Include i 
clienti della primo-persona dagli schiavi precedenti, dalle opinioni 
giudiziarie, dalle parti di abolitionist e da più.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">παρουσιάζει δύο δωδεκάες δημοσιεύσεις που γράφονται 
στο 19$ο αιώνα για τη σκλαβιά στην Αμερική. Περιλαμβάνει 
τους απολογισμούς πρώτος-προσώπων από τους προηγούμενους 
σκλάβους, τις δικαστικές απόψεις, τα κομμάτια ρεφορμιστών, και 
περισσότερους.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">presentes dos publicaciones docena escritas en el 
diecinueveavo siglo sobre esclavitud en América. Incluye 
cuentas de la primero-persona de esclavos anteriores, de opiniones 
judiciales, de pedazos del abolitionist, y más.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206597</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>105155</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/slavery-and-abolition</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
